Jargon Term: Please follow up with your appointments as documented below.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - Upcoming Schedules - Specialist appointment

Jargon Term: Please take your medications as prescribed.
Annotation: Aftercare instructions - patient needs to do - Medication

Jargon Term: Please return to the hospital if you develop fevers, chills, redness or warmth over the site of the pacemaker, chest pain, lightheadedness, palpitations, shortness of breath, or any other concerning symptoms.
